text: A Boat to the Beach (Farsi:Balami be soo-ye sahel) is an Iranian film by the director Rasul Molaghlipour. Molaghlipour also scripted the film. It was released in 1985, and is an early example of Sacred Defense Cinema, i.e. cinema about the Iran Iraq war. Among others, it starred Behzad Behzadpour and Jafar Dehghan.IMDb ==References== category:Iranian films Category:Iranian war films Category:Persian-language films Category:1985 films Category:Iran–Iraq War films
title: A Boat to the Beach (Iranian film)
